text: Rahil Azam (born 25 September 1981) is an Indian actor and model, who has appeared as Hatim in Hatim, as Nakul in CID, as JD in Tu Aashiqui, as DSP Anubhav Singh in Maddam Sir, and as Rahul/Ajinkya in Achanak 37 Saal Baad. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:1981 births Category:21st-century Indian actors Category:Indian soap opera actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Actors from Bangalore Category:Actors from Mumbai Category:Actors in Hindi television Category:Actors in Kannada television Category:Reality television participants
title: Rahil Azam
